alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 5:04PM MDT until June 23 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Garfield County in southern Utah... South Central Wayne County in southern Utah... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 504 PM MDT, the public reported flash flooding is occurring in Hanksville along Bull Creek. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes, slot canyons, streams and slickrock areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hanksville. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 276 between mile markers 0 and 4. Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 31. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 113 and 118. This includes the following streams and drainages... Bull Creek in the town of Hanksville, Poison Springs, Conundrum Canyon and other area streams, dry washes and slot canyons. This warning replaces the previous warnings in effect for the area. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
